name: The Unfair Resolution
description:
• Set your new year resolution in an unfair world where you only get 2 options.
  • Roll the ball and go through a procedural path of luck and movement guessing.
  • Avoid those sharp arrows and obstacles that may divert you from your goal.

Credits:

  • 3D models: Kaykit Mini Variety Pack and Kenney's Asset Pack
  • Sound Effects: Casual Game SFX Unity Asset Store

Controls:

  • For Keyboard users : WASD or Arrow Keys for movement
  • For GamePad users: Left Stick For movement
